detectors.description:
Burger_Finance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Burger_Finance.sol#53-62) may have integer overflow

	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Burger_Finance.sol#56)

detectors.description:
